title.rendered: How to Recover Deleted Photos from Phone Gallery

content.rendered:
If you just deleted a photo off of your phone, take a deep breath. We can almost guarantee it’s able to be recovered. We created Dumpster to solve this exact problem.

Yes, it’s as good as it sounds! Dumpster is an Android app that can restore almost any deleted photo. It’s also able to restore videos, songs, documents, apps, and more! Not to mention, once it’s installed on your Android phone or tablet, it can also act as a backup. You’ll never accidentally lose a photo again. 

How to Restore Deleted Pictures from Photo Gallery 

Dumpster is one of the simplest apps to use. It’s straight to the point and can easily be used by people of all ages. The app uses cutting-edge technology with its Deep Scan Recovery feature, which allows Dumpster to detect most old and deleted content. In simplest terms, here’s how Dumpster works:

As soon as Dumpster is installed, it will start scanning your device and restoring all of your old deleted photos. As Dumpster doesn’t know which photo you’re looking for, it will populate a lot of old content that was once stored on your phone or tablet. Your old photos will populate and live in Dumpster’s Recycle Bin. Think of this as the Trash on your laptop or PC. 

The only thing you need to do next is scroll through all of the content to find your missing photo. You can browse through the photos with fast filtering. You can sort by date and even the file type! For example, if you know the photo you’re missing is a Christmas party picture from last year, you can search by month!

Once you find the missing photo, just tap it and restore it. The photo will then appear back on your device.  

We may seem biased, however, we highly recommend you download Dumpster to prevent accidentally deleting other files off of your device. Dumpster will immediately catch all deleted photos & videos, meaning, you’ll never lose content again. 

Dumpster can also serve as cloud storage! If you’re always running out of space on your phone, cloud storage is the way to go. By automatically uploading your new (and old) photos & videos to the cloud, you can almost immediately make space on your phone’s camera gallery by deleting the stored content. 

What Are You Waiting For? Never Accidentally Delete a Photo Again!
